title: Not That Kind of Influencer
description: A Korean story about Bo-mi, a cat café worker who secretly runs a viral Instagram account where she photoshops her cat into romantic couple poses. When her fake boyfriend gets doxxed, she recruits her weird metal guitarist neighbor to pretend to be her boyfriend.

chapters.title: Me Behind the Filter
chapters.description: Cat café worker's fake online romance creates real-life pressure.

sentences.필터 뒤의 나 오늘도 고양이 카페에서 온종일 고양이털과 씨름하고 돌아왔다: The me behind the filter. Today, I came home after wrestling with cat fur all day at the cat cafe.
Pudding greeted me on my bed with a grumpy expression.
But the me on Instagram was different.
I was 'Romantic Bomi,' experiencing a perfect love.
With practiced ease, I opened Photoshop.
This time, I Photoshopped Pudding next to a boyfriend in a tuxedo.
The background was on a romantic bridge in Venice, Italy.
sentences.'사랑하는 자기와 베네치아에서 잊지 못할 밤 ✨' 캡션을 달고 하트 이모: I added the caption 'An unforgettable night in Venice with my beloved ✨' and attached three heart emojis.
As soon as the perfectly fake photo was uploaded, thousands of 'likes' poured in.
sentences.'언니! 연애의 신인가요?' '진짜 너무 예쁜 사랑이에요, 부러워 죽겠어: Comments like 'Unnie! Are you the goddess of romance?' and 'Your love is so beautiful, I'm dying of envy!' poured out.
The more that happened, the deeper the emptiness inside me grew.
Yet, all of this was a perfect lie.
Ding-dong! A DM arrived with a notification sound.
sentences.'보미님! 안녕하세요! 저희 커플 계정 팔로우하는데 혹시 저희랑 담에 더: 'Hi Bomi! We follow your couple's account, and we were wondering if you'd be interested in a double date with us sometime? You two look so good together, we'd love to meet you! 😊'
My heart plummeted to my feet.
sentences.온라인의 '로맨틱 보미'는 미소 짓고 있었지만, 현실의 나는 침대 위 푸: The 'Romantic Bomi' online was smiling, but the real me froze like Pudding on the bed.

chapters.title: Double Date Operation
chapters.description: Bomi Teaches Minseok Double Date Role-Playing.

Bomi eventually sent a reply accepting the double date offer.
When she informed Minseok of the news, he blinked, seemingly bewildered.
sentences.\"어... 뭘 어떻게 하라는 건데요?\": "Uh... what exactly am I supposed to do?"
Bomi let out a deep sigh at his nonchalant tone.
sentences.\"일단, 연습해야 돼. 로맨틱한 남자친구 연기.\": "First, we need to practice. The romantic boyfriend act."
sentences.그날 저녁, 민석의 자취방 거실은 급조된 '데이트 리허설' 무대가 되었다: That evening, Minseok's living room turned into an impromptu 'date rehearsal' stage.
Bomi stood with her arms crossed, giving instructions like a director.
sentences.\"손은 자연스럽게 잡아주고... 눈은 마주보고 달달하게 웃어봐!\": "Take my hand naturally... Look into my eyes and give a sweet smile!"
sentences.민석은 어색하게 손을 내밀었고, 보미의 손이 닿자마자 흠칫 놀라 팔짱을: Minseok awkwardly extended his hand, and the moment Bomi's hand touched his, he flinched in surprise and recoiled.
His forced smile resembled a demon's grimace from a metal band.
sentences.보미는 화면 속 완벽한 연인들의 모습과 눈앞의 불편한 현실 사이의 간극에: Bomi felt a profound sense of dismay at the vast gap between the perfect lovers on screen and the awkward reality before her eyes.

chapters.title: Real-life Romance
chapters.description: Minseok's awkwardness threatens the fake romance.

On the day of the double date, Bomi felt her heart sink to her toes.
sentences.약속 장소인 브런치 카페에서 민석은 옆 테이블의 비건 메뉴를 분석하는 로: At the brunch cafe, their meeting spot, Minseok sat like a robot analyzing the vegan menu at the next table.
sentences.선아와 준은 눈을 반짝이며 \"두 분은 어떻게 만나셨어요? 인스타에서 정: Seona and Jun, with sparkling eyes, asked, "How did you two meet? You looked so good together on Instagram!"
sentences.민석은 무표정하게 \"아, 옆집 삽니다. 한 번 인사한 적 있습니다\"라: Minseok replied blankly, "Oh, we live next door to each other. We've said hello once." Bomi, however, quickly forced an exaggerated laugh, exclaiming, "Oh, isn't it just like fate? To run into each other by chance right outside our homes! From that day on, I just knew it was a special connection!"
Jun looked at Minseok, and Seona looked at Bomi, both with dubious expressions, switching their gaze between them.
sentences.이어 선아가 \"혹시 두 분만의 특별한 데이트 장소나 취미는 없으세요?\: Then, when Seona asked, "Do you two have any special date spots or hobbies just for yourselves?", Minseok mumbled, "I mostly practice guitar at home. I haven't really done anything one might call a date..."
sentences.보미는 민석의 발을 걷어차며 \"아, 저희는 집에서 같이 고양이 영상을: Bomi kicked Minseok's foot and frantically tried to keep the conversation going, saying, "Oh, we watch cat videos together at home, or... um... we enjoy little, simple joys! We have lots of secret date spots, but I can't say them because they'll become too famous!"
sentences.인스타그램 속 완벽한 로맨스와 현실의 어색한 공기 사이에서 보미는 숨이: Between the perfect romance depicted on Instagram and the awkward reality, Bomi felt suffocated.
sentences.민석이 포크로 토마토를 집어 들다 접시에 떨어뜨리는 순간, 보미는 이 가: The moment Minseok picked up a tomato with his fork and dropped it back onto the plate, Bomi was overwhelmed with anxiety that this fake relationship might end today.
The fans' expectations and gazes weighed heavily on her.

The lingering afterimages of the dreadful double date haunted Bomi for days.
sentences.민석의 로봇 같은 어색함과 팬 커플의 꿰뚫어 보는 듯한 눈빛이 잊히지 않: Minseok's robotic awkwardness and the fan couple's penetrating gaze were unforgettable.
Just as she was about to breathe a sigh of relief, her phone chimed.
It was an Instagram DM from the familiar fan couple.
sentences.\"보미님, 민석님! 지난번 정말 반가웠어요! 저희 커플, 요즘 '라이브: "Hi Bomi and Minseok! It was so nice meeting you last time! Our couple is currently participating in the 'Live Couple Challenge'... Would your couple perhaps be interested in joining us? It's really fun and great for interacting with fans!"
The moment she read the message, the color drained from Bomi's face.
sentences.'라이브'라고? 실시간으로 민석과 연기해야 한다고?: 'Live'? I have to act with Minseok in real time?
sentences.포토샵으로 완벽하게 꾸며낸 환상의 세계가, 이제는 실시간 영상 앞에서 처: The fantasy world, perfectly crafted with Photoshop, was now on the verge of collapsing miserably in front of live video.
The followers' intense gazes felt like daggers.
Her hands and feet grew cold.
sentences.그녀의 '완벽한 연애'는 과연 이 라이브 지옥을 견뎌낼 수 있을까?: Could her 'perfect relationship' truly withstand this live hell?

chapters.title: Live Couple Challenge Disaster
chapters.description: Bomi attempts to prepare Min-seok for a 'Live Couple Challenge' by having him memorize romantic answers, but during the broadcast, Min-seok's literal responses about their first meeting and falling in love threaten to expose their fake relationship to thousands of viewers.

Bomi made Minseok sit down and memorize the anticipated 'Couple Q&A' questions by heart.
sentences.\"만약 '가장 좋아하는 데이트 장소는?' 물으면, '한강!' 알았죠?: "If they ask, 'What's your favorite date spot?' it's 'Han River!' Got it? Don't say something like 'home'!"
Minseok nodded with a blank expression.
Finally, it was time for the live broadcast.
On the phone screen, the number of 'N viewers' surged rapidly.
Bomi forced a smile, but her hands were sweating.
sentences.첫 질문, \"두 분의 첫 만남은 어떻게 되나요?\": The first question: "How did the two of you first meet?"
Bomi looked at Minseok, her eyes filled with anticipation for a romantic story.
sentences.민석은 잠시 침묵하더니, \"음... 옆집에 이사 왔을 때요. 복도에서: Minseok was silent for a moment, then said, "Um... when I moved in next door. We ran into each other in the hallway."
The chat window was flooded with 'lol's and 'So realistic!'
sentences.보미는 애써 웃으며 \"민석 씨가 좀 쿨하죠?\"라고 수습했지만, 이미: Bomi forced a laugh and said, "Minseok is quite cool, isn't he?" She tried to salvage the situation, but it was already too late.
sentences.두 번째 질문, \"서로에게 반한 순간은?\": Second question: "What was the moment you fell for each other?"
sentences.보미는 속으로 '묘하게 예쁜 순간!'을 외쳤지만, 민석은 아무 생각 없이: Bomi inwardly exclaimed, 'A subtly beautiful moment!' But Minseok answered thoughtlessly, "While giving cat treats."
sentences.수천 명의 시청자 앞에서 보미의 완벽한 가상 연애가 산산조각 날 위기에: Bomi's perfect virtual relationship was on the verge of shattering in front of thousands of viewers.

chapters.title: The Excuse of Awkwardness
chapters.description: Bo-mi spins, Min-seok falters, fan couple's suspicion grows.

sentences.보미는 민석의 기묘한 답변에 식은땀을 흘리면서도, 필사적으로 카메라를 향: Even as Bomi broke into a cold sweat at Minseok's peculiar answer, she desperately smiled brightly at the camera.
sentences.\"어머, 저희 민석 씨는 원래 좀 엉뚱한 매력이 넘치거든요!: "Oh my, our Minseok has always had a quirky charm about him!
sentences.연애 초엔 워낙 부끄러움이 많아서 저렇게 솔직하다 못해 기상천외한 표현밖: In the early days of our relationship, he was so incredibly shy that he could only express himself in such outlandish ways, beyond just being honest.
And that's our own secret way of dating.
" She rattled off comments that went beyond cringeworthy without a moment's pause.
sentences.댓글창은 '귀여워', '반전 매력', '알고 보니 순정남' 등으로 도배되: While the comment section was flooded with remarks like 'Cute,' 'Unexpected charm,' and 'Turns out he's a true romantic,' the expressions of the fan couple on the live screen held a subtle suspicion.
Especially Yoona, who stared intently at the screen, said with a peculiar smile.
It seems you two have a very well-defined world of your own.
A world we wouldn't dare intrude upon.
sentences.\" 그 '독특한'과 '끼어들 수 없는'이라는 단어에 담긴 묘한 억양은: " The peculiar intonation in the words 'unique' and 'cannot intrude' made Bomi's heart sink.
A chill ran down her spine.
She felt the looks of suspicion growing clearer.
sentences.다음 질문, 특히 관계를 파고드는 질문이 올까 봐 소름 끼치도록 두려웠다: She was terrifyingly afraid that the next question would come, especially one that delved into their relationship.
At this rate, everything was sure to be exposed.

chapters.title: Suspicious Friendship Date
chapters.description: Fan couple's 'friendly' invite, another intense test.

sentences.라이브 방송의 후폭풍이 가라앉기도 전에, 윤아에게서 또다시 DM이 도착했: Before the fallout from the live broadcast had even subsided, another DM arrived from Yoona.
sentences.\"보미님 커플과 저희 커플, 이번엔 편하게 '우정 데이트' 어떠세요?: "Bomi, how about our two couples go on a relaxed 'friendship date' this time?
😊" The moment Bomi read the message, her fingertips grew cold.
They were already doubting their relationship.
Trying hard to conceal her anxiety, she went to the cafe with Minseok.
sentences.윤아는 시종일관 미소를 띠었지만, 그녀의 눈은 매 순간 보미와 민석의 모: Yoona wore a constant smile, but her eyes relentlessly followed every movement and glance of Bomi and Minseok.
sentences.\"민석님은 보미님 어떤 점에 반하셨어요?: "Minseok, what made you fall for Bomi?
" Yoona asked in a sweet voice.
Minseok looked at the ceiling for a moment and said, "Hmm...
sentences.고양이 털 알레르기가 없다는 점이요?: The fact that she doesn't have a cat allergy?
sentences.\" 그의 진지한 대답에 보미는 억지로 미소를 지었지만, 속으로는 비명을: " At his serious answer, Bomi forced a smile, but screamed internally.
Yoona laughed awkwardly, but her gaze grew even sharper.
sentences.\"두 분은 평소에 어떤 데이트를 주로 하시나요?: "What kind of dates do you two usually go on?
sentences.\"라는 질문에는 민석이 \"주로 제 방에서 기타 연습하고 보미님은 고양: " To which Minseok replied, "Mainly, I practice guitar in my room, and Bomi gives the cat snacks."
Cold sweat ran down Bomi's spine.
sentences.이 '우정 데이트'는 편안함과는 거리가 먼, 살얼음판 위를 걷는 듯한 심: This 'friendship date' was far from comfortable; it was an interrogation like walking on thin ice.
